examples: As with all new ideas it met with resistance.
Como ocurre con todas las ideas nuevas, encontró resistencia.
There has been a lot of resistance to this new law.
Ha habido mucha resistencia a esta nueva ley.
Resistance to change has nearly destroyed the industry.
La resistencia al cambio casi ha destruido la industria.
There were a number of episodes of armed resistance during the early years of occupation.
Hubo varios episodios de resistencia armada durante los primeros años de ocupación.
